description.narrative: Luminus Group (the Group) is a leading private vocational and technical training provider in Jordan, with plans for regional expansion. Luminus Media is the media-focused technical training arm of the Group, offering certificates and diploma programs in digital filmmaking, audio engineering, animation, multimedia, web and graphic design. Luminus Education is the largest and core business line of the Groups operations and currently serves 4,500 students. Under its umbrella lies an English language training center, a vocational and careers development training center, and Al-Quds College which was established over 30 years ago and operates as the largest vocational and technical training community college in Jordan today. With a strategic eye on future growth and sustainability, the Group is undertaking a US$19.5 million investment program to support the Groups expansionary plans in Jordan, Iraq, Libya, Lebanon, and Egypt. The Project falls under the IFCs e4e Initiative for Arab Youth (e4e), which is aimed at addressing the mismatch between labor market needs and the skills of Arab youth by, among its scope, enabling greater private sector provision of quality, job-oriented tertiary education.

The expected development impact is expected to include the following: - Create a demonstration effect of successful TVET model with strong link to labor market needs. - Expanded access and quality of vocational provision with direct impact on unemployment. - Increased number of students reached in the region. - Successful implementation of expansion in Lebanon will send a positive signal for further south-south investments.

name.narrative: The Project is headquartered in Amman and has expansion plans in the region which include Iraq, Libya, Lebanon, and Egypt.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: T-AB - Colleges, Universities, and Professional Schools

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
